name: Returned Item Status
Cancel Returned Item Status
Return Amount- Purchase Receipt
Set Unique Item Name
Delete Unchecked Record
Sales Invoice Time
script:
if doc.is_return and doc.update_stock :
    doc.set_posting_time = True
    doc.posting_time = "00:00:01"
    frappe.msgprint(f"Because of This Sales Invoice is of Return Type and You have check on 'Update Stock' , Posting Time set to '00.00.01'")
